label: 中右記
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Chūyūki (中右記), sometimes pronounced nakauki, and referred to as Munetadakō ki (宗忠公記), Gurin (愚林). This diary of the minister of the right Fujiwara no Munetada (1062-1141) is voluminous, covering the period from 1087 to 1138, and provides invaluable information on the political and social life of the court of the era.
